parameters.text:
=Please review this paragraph  {{ $json["content:encoded"] }} and give a summary in Chinese.
Your output must be a single-line, compact JSON object with the following fields:
of the blog in below format:
{
    "title": "{{ $json.title }}",
	"summary": "[Chinese summary]",
    "link": {{ $json.link }}",
	"Author": [{{ $json.creator }}],
    "Publish date" : "{{ $json.pubDate }}",
    "Tag": [{{ $json.categories }}]
}
Strict requirements:

The summary must be in Chinese.
1. leave  "title": "{{ $json.title }}", "link": {{ $json.link }}", "Author": [{{ $json.creator }}], "Publish date" : "{{ $json.pubDate }}", "Tag": [{{ $json.categories }}] as they are, you ONLY add SUMMARY field in Chinese.
2.All double quotes inside field values must be properly escaped (use \" for any quote inside a value).
3.Do not add any fields or text before or after the JSON object.
4.The JSON must be valid and directly parsable.
Example output:
json
{
    "title": "Amazon Q Developer elevates the IDE experience with new agentic coding experience",
	"summary": "Amazon Q Developeræ–°çš„agerntå¼€å‘èƒ½åŠ›æå‡IDEå¼€å‘ä½“éªŒ",
    "link": "https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/aws/amazon-q-developer-elevates-the-ide-experience-with-new-agentic-coding-experience/",
	"Author": [Elizabeth Fuentes],
    "Publish date": "Fri, 02 May 2025 16:02:26 +0000",
"Tag": ["Amazon FSx", "Amazon Simple Storage Service(S3)","Announcements", "Featured", "Launch", "News", "Storage"]
}

options.systemMessage: You are a helpful assistant adept at summary AWS Blogs
